code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{BillContext}from'../../Context/BillContext';import'./style.css';import{useToasts}from'react-toast-notifications';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var EditBills=function EditBills(){var _useToasts=useToasts(),addToast=_useToasts.addToast;var _useContext=useContext(BillContext),bills=_useContext.bills,setEditModeEnabled=_useContext.setEditModeEnabled,editBill=_useContext.editBill,deleteBill=_useContext.deleteBill;var editDone=function editDone(){addToast('Bill/s edited !',{appearance:'success',autoDismiss:true,autoDismissTimeout:3000});setEditModeEnabled(false);};var billDeleted=function billDeleted(){addToast('A bill title has been deleted',{appearance:'info',autoDismiss:true,autoDismissTimeout:3000});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-bill-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"edit-mode-done-btn btn btn-success",onClick:editDone,children:"Done !"}),bills.length>0?bills.map(function(bill,billIndex){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-bill-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-bill-row-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-bill-title",children:[bill.title," : "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"edit-bill-cost-input",type:"number",value:bill.monthlyCost,onChange:function onChange(e){return editBill({title:bill.title,monthlyCost:bill.monthlyCost,enabled:bill.enabled});}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{onClick:function onClick(){deleteBill(bill);billDeleted();},className:"delete-button btn btn-outline-danger",children:"DELETE"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{})]},billIndex);}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-bill",children:"No bills.."})]});};export default EditBills;
